attributes.action: Demanding for injustice against civillians, in Britain as well as Nationally. American family stuck in Pakistan.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An American family stuck in Pakistan. A man carried from USA to Pakistan, by the ICE and tortured. Wife came with 2 children. Help is being refused.
For more Info:
http://www.youtube.com/user/mmok2k8
This is on their behalf. And increasing awareness of this matter in society.
Citizens to be treated equally.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the USA government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
